name: Core_InlineArrayList_removeManyFront
signatureRemarks: where <Suffix> and <Type> can assume the values of

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: The length of the sequence of elements to remove.

success: The sequence of elements @{code('[0, length)')} was removed from this @{code('Core_InlineArrayList<Suffix>')} object.
Consequently, the size of the @{code('Core_InlineArrayList<Suffix>')} object is reduced by @{code('length')}.
If a @{code('Core_InlineArrayList<Suffix>_ElementRemovedCallback')} function is associated with this @{code('Core_InlineArrayList<Suffix>')} object,
the function was invoked on each removed element exactly once.

errors.errorCondition: @{code('length')} is greater than the size of this @{code('Core_InlineArrayList<Suffix>')} object.

description: Remove a range of elements from the front.
remarks: This function sets the by-thread error variable on failure.
This function fails only with the specified errors/error conditions.
